Articles.Content:
i have always like the ARC-170, and i thought i would build it

it has upwards of 120 parts, 4 main jet engines, 2 main rocket engines and 2 VTOL engines. i have absolutely NO IDEA whether it can or can't fly, 3 of the big landing legs werent enough to support it's weight fully and i think its kinda hideous, but i still love it because i made it. its like having an ugly child.

screenies in SPH and on the runway:
Pretty accurate, but the wings are in the middle and are attached to the engine pods...

Pretty accurate, but the wings are in the middle and are attached to the engine pods...

http://static1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20090130232515/starwars/images/4/4f/ARC-170.jpg

The engines need to be moved closer the middle in the first place.
if you guys want the craft file i could upload it

all those intakes on the side are a bit overkill, if you replace them (or every other one or something) with reaction wheels it'll look better and increase it's controlability (assuming its aerodynamics and thrust to CoM alignment are terrible like most sci-fi recreations)
